employee_questionnaire.question: Overall, I am completely satisfied with my job.
employee_questionnaire.description: Describe what contributes most to your job satisfaction. What aspects do you enjoy, and what, if anything, would make your experience even better?

employee_questionnaire.question: My work has a clear sense of purpose.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please explain how your work aligns with your personal and professional goals. Do you feel motivated by the purpose of your tasks?

employee_questionnaire.question: I feel happy at work most of the time.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please share the key elements that make you feel happy at work. Are there specific moments or aspects that bring you the most joy?

employee_questionnaire.question: I feel stressed at work most of the time.
employee_questionnaire.description: Describe any specific sources of stress you experience at work. Are there ways you think the company could support you in managing this stress?

employee_questionnaire.question: I am paid fairly for my work.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please share your perspective on compensation. Do you feel that it reflects your responsibilities and contributions?

employee_questionnaire.question: There are people at work who give me support and encouragement.
employee_questionnaire.description: Explain your experience with receiving support from colleagues or leaders. Are there any improvements you'd like to see in this area?

employee_questionnaire.question: There are people at work who appreciate me as a person.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please describe how you feel valued on a personal level at work. Are there moments when you feel genuinely appreciated by those around you?

employee_questionnaire.question: I can trust people in my company.
employee_questionnaire.description: Describe your level of trust in your colleagues and leaders. Are there any experiences that have shaped your trust positively or negatively?

employee_questionnaire.question: I feel a sense of belonging in my company.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please share what makes you feel connected to the company. Are there specific aspects of the workplace culture that help you feel part of the team?

employee_questionnaire.question: My manager helps me succeed.
employee_questionnaire.description: Explain how your manager supports your professional growth. Are there additional ways they could assist in your success?

employee_questionnaire.question: My work environment feels inclusive and respectful of all people.
employee_questionnaire.description: Describe your experience with inclusivity and respect at work. Are there any areas where you feel the company could improve in promoting inclusivity?

employee_questionnaire.question: My work has the time and location flexibility I need.
employee_questionnaire.description: Please share your experience with work flexibility. Does it support your work-life balance, or is there more the company could do?

employee_questionnaire.question: In most of my work tasks, I feel energized.
employee_questionnaire.description: Explain what aspects of your work make you feel energized and motivated. Are there any tasks that you find draining, and why?

employee_questionnaire.question: I am achieving most of my goals at work.
employee_questionnaire.description: Describe your progress toward your work goals. Are there any challenges that have made it difficult to meet them?

employee_questionnaire.question: I often learn something at work.
employee_questionnaire.description: Share how your work contributes to your learning and development. Are there areas where you'd like to learn more or gain new skills?
